version_description: Improvements and bug fixes.

We've been getting rid of bugs in the Mango app. Don't worry, we don't squish them; we pick them up and carry them outside. One of the nastier ones: learners were forced to login way more than they're supposed to. Pretty sure that won't happen anymore.
We've made some minor improvements and bug fixes. We've also been working hard to make Mango more fun, effective, and interactive. Cool new stuff will be coming soon!
We've updated our app to better support iOS 9. We've also been working hard to make Mango more fun, effective, and interactive. Cool new stuff will be coming (very) soon!

We've been working hard to make the Mango app easier to use for learners who are visually impaired, learners who are deaf, and learners with disabilities. This means that we've increased color contrast and font sizes, and improved VoiceOver support. We've

Hallo!
Unit 1 of German is now better than ever! Check out new vocabulary and more in-depth grammar practice.
We've also squashed several smaller bugs to improve your experience.
Not a fan of subtitles? Now you can disable them on your iPad. Lo

• Learners can now tap "Show Answer" before the narrator finishes speaking
• No more bed bugs - we've fixed a bug that caused night mode crashes
• All good things must come to an end. As of this release, users must have a device running iOS 8 or hig

We’ve got some exciting changes to the Mango app coming your way! Log in or create a free profile in the app to explore our fresh, streamlined design that makes learning all the more fun.

Keep learning past lesson 3! Easily link your account to gai

Thanks to your feedback, we’ve spotted and squashed several bugs that were causing the app to crash. We’ve also made some design tweaks to keep your language-learning experience as beautiful as possible!

In case you missed it, here’s what changed i

Can’t get enough lessons? Now you can tap “Download All” for multiple chapters at a time.

We’ve also made improvements for iPhone X users!

Thanks for using Mango Languages. Like what you’re seeing? Leave us a review!

We heard that many of you are into landscapes. If that’s you, then we have great news: landscape orientation is now supported on iPads! Turn off your orientation lock and rotate your device to check it out.

We’ve made some tweaks to our lesson selection screen to make it easier to find the lesson you want. Additionally, we’ve improved landscape orientation, iPhone X learners will notice a better experience, and a few bugs have been squashed.

Want to s

Added a language to your language list? Now your changes are reflected across all your devices. We’ve also fixed some bugs and made internal improvements to keep the app running well.

Your voice matters! Leave a review so we can make your language-

Added a language to your language list? Now your changes are reflected across all your devices. We’ve also fixed some bugs and made internal improvements to keep the app running well.
Your voice matters! Leave a review so we can make your language-lear

You spotted the bugs, we listened! A pest-free language-learning experience awaits you.

Love language learning? Leave us a review and let us know what you like about the Mango app!

For learners in the EU, this update includes changes to comply with GDPR.

Your voice matters! Leave a review so we can make your
language-learning experience better than ever.

Thanks to user feedback, we now have a brand new "Log In" button on the home screen. It's bigger and easier to spot than ever.

We've also fixed crashes that some of you experienced when logging in and accessing learning content.

Loving lear

Our app is now faster than ever! Whether you’re installing for the first time, logging in or out, or restarting the app, the loading speed won’t delay your learning — even on the slowest connections.

Love learning with Mango? Tell us about it by le

Get back into your lessons faster with improved auto-login functionality.

We’ve also made some changes to comply with European privacy regulations (GDPR) along a few fixes to keep your Mango experience the smoothest possible.

Don’t forget t

Thanks to user feedback, we’ve made a few changes to streamline your Mango experience! You’re now able to reset your password from within the app, as well as being provided the option to turn off multiple choice questions.

Your voice matters! Leav
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you already know and love Mango we have added a “Sign Up” button to allow you to create a profile right away without having to go through a lesson first.

We’ve made it even easier to keep track of your linked accounts and subscriptions in your

We’ve made a few tweaks to prevent some crashes that a few users were experiencing when accessing learning content.

Want to show us some love or let us know about an issue? Leave a review so we can make the app even better!

You may now automatically advance to the next lesson while using Autoplay when not running in the background.

Various behind the scenes fixes to improve your Mango learning experience.

Love Mango? Have questions? Be sure to leave us a comme

We made some behind the scenes tweaks to keep your Mango experience the smoothest possible.

Don’t forget to leave us a review!

We have made a few tweaks to how information is displayed within the app for smoother navigation.

Addition of Spanish translations to the iOS app store.

The next evolution of Mango is here. Introducing a whole new learning environment,  responsive to your study habits. The updated Mango learning system is enhanced with a simplified design and comprehensive activities to enrich your learning experience.<br

The next evolution of Mango is here. Introducing a whole new learning environment,  responsive to your study habits. The updated Mango learning system is enhanced with a simplified design and comprehensive activities to enrich your learning experience.<br

Various behind the scenes fixes to improve your language learning experience.
Various fixes to improve stability
